籤詩版本二:
Kufanele ukhulume ngokungagwegwesi futhi ukhumbule ukungawafuni amanye amakhono kwezinye izindawo.
Kumele ubambelele empilweni yakho yakudala, akukho okunye okuzokulungela
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lokungagcini futhi ukugcina isikhathi.
Kuhle ukucophelela kukho konke.
解曰: Phila futhi uhlale. Kuyafiseleka futhi kuphumelele. Ungenzi okunye. Vele ubambe ongezansi.
籤詩故事一:
◇INkosi uWen yacela ukubhula
Inkosi uWen yoBukhosi bakwaZhou yayikwazi ukubhula. Inkosi uZhou yambiza ngaleso sikhathi. INkosi uWen yabala ukuthi lolu hambo lwalunebhadi futhi lwaluzoletha amashwa eminyaka eyisikhombisa, ngakho yatshela indodana yayo endala, uBoyi, ukuba ibuse uQi (igama yendawo) ngokomthetho futhi ungaphumi ngaphandle.
Kamuva, iNkosi u-Wen yaboshwa yiNkosi uZhou e-Youli (igama lendawo).
Ngaleso sikhathi indodana endala yenkosi uWen yahamba iyosindisa uyise, kodwa yabulawa ngoba ikhohlwe iziyalo zikayise.
聖意: Ikhaya ngokwalo ngokuvamile alilungile, lifuna ingcebo kanye nenhlanhla, ukuthengiselana, umshado, i-alamu ye-Liujia, i-Chitian silkworm amaphuzu amahlanu, ukulimala kwemfuyo eyisithupha, abantu abalahlekile, icala lomphakathi, ukufuduka, ukulondoloza, impahla elahlekile, ukugula, isifo esibi, ithuna lase-Anshan kufanele kushintshwe.
